automate_facebook_lead_generation: Automate lead generation and management through Facebook Lead Ads integration.
configure_facebook_app_credentials: Configure your Facebook app credentials for lead integration.
configure_facebook_webhook_settings: Configure webhook settings for receiving Facebook lead data.
webhook_verify_token_help: Token used to verify webhook requests from Facebook.
webhook_url_help: Use this URL in your Facebook webhook configuration.
facebook_lead_feature_not_available_in_p: Facebook Lead integration is not available in your current plan
fb_app_credentials_required: Facebook App ID and App Secret are required to fetch pages
fb_page_subscribed_successfully: Page subscribed successfully for lead generation
manage_facebook_pages: Manage your Facebook pages and lead forms integration
fetch_pages_instruction: Enter your Facebook App credentials above and click 'Fetch Facebook Pages' to load your pages
fb_authorization_cancelled: Facebook authorization was cancelled. Please try again and authorize all permissions.
fb_login_failed: Facebook login failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
fb_credentials_changed_cleared: App credentials changed. Previous pages and access token have been cleared. Please fetch pages again.
fb_access_token_missing: Facebook access token is missing for lead processing
fb_lead_data_invalid: Facebook lead data is invalid or incomplete
fb_lead_fetch_failed: Failed to fetch Facebook lead data from API
fb_lead_contact_already_exists: Contact already exists for this Facebook lead
fb_lead_contact_created: Contact created successfully from Facebook lead
fb_lead_contact_creation_failed: Failed to create contact from Facebook lead
fb_lead_custom_field_failed: Failed to save custom field data for Facebook lead contact
fb_lead_source_note: Lead generated from Facebook Lead Ad
fb_custom_fields_info: Custom fields from your Facebook Lead forms can be automatically mapped to contact custom fields:
fb_custom_field_auto_mapping: Any field not matching standard fields will be treated as a custom field
fb_custom_field_slug_matching: Custom fields are matched by slug (e.g., 'budget' field maps to 'budget' custom field)
fb_available_custom_fields: Available Custom Fields in Your System
fb_webhook_setup_instructions: To complete Facebook Lead integration, follow these steps:
fb_webhook_step_1: Copy the Webhook URL and Verify Token from above
fb_webhook_step_2: Go to your Facebook App → Products → Webhooks
fb_webhook_step_3: Add the webhook URL and verify token, subscribe to 'leadgen' events
fb_webhook_step_4: Test the webhook to ensure leads are processed correctly
fb_at_least_one_page_required: At least one Facebook page must be subscribed when Facebook Lead integration is enabled
fb_old_subscriptions_cleared: Previous subscriptions and data have been cleared. Please authenticate with Facebook to fetch new pages
